itemOffered.name: Daily Living Support
itemOffered.description: Assistance with daily personal activities such as showering, dressing, meal preparation, and other essential tasks.

itemOffered.name: Community Participation
itemOffered.description: Support to access and engage in community activities, promoting social inclusion and independence.

itemOffered.name: Support Coordination
itemOffered.description: Assistance with coordinating supports and services to help participants implement their NDIS plans effectively.

itemOffered.name: Specialist Disability Accommodation
itemOffered.description: Purpose-built housing for people who require specialist housing solutions due to their disability.

review.reviewBody: The support I receive from Vitality Community Care has been life-changing. Their staff are professional, caring, and genuinely invested in helping me achieve my goals.
